title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-12.5 - Post-construction monitoring
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-12.5 - Post-construction monitoring

State Regulations

The owner or operator of a new or modified facility may
be required, after construction of the facility or modification, to conduct
such ambient monitoring as the department determines is necessary to determine
the effect of the emissions from the new or modified facility on air quality in
any area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
231-12.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
